verses.verse: When I would have healed<WH7495> Israel,<WH3478> then the iniquity<WH5771> of Ephraim<WH669> was discovered,<WH1540> and the wickedness<WH7451> of Samaria:<WH8111> for<WH3588> they commit<WH6466> falsehood;<WH8267> and the thief<WH1590> cometh in,<WH935> and the troop of robbers<WH1416> spoileth<WH6584> without.<WH2351>

And they consider<WH559> not<WH1077> in their hearts<WH3824> that I remember<WH2142> all<WH3605> their wickedness:<WH7451> now<WH6258> their own doings<WH4611> have beset them about;<WH5437> they are<WH1961> before<WH5048> my face.<WH6440>
They make the king glad<WH8055> <WH4428> with their wickedness,<WH7451> and the princes<WH8269> with their lies.<WH3585>

They are all<WH3605> adulterers,<WH5003> as<WH3644> an oven<WH8574> heated<WH1197> by<WH4480> the baker,<WH644> who ceaseth<WH7673> from raising<WH4480> <WH5782> after he hath kneaded<WH4480> <WH3888> the dough,<WH1217> until<WH5704> it be leavened.<WH2556>

In the day<WH3117> of our king<WH4428> the princes<WH8269> have made him sick<WH2470> with bottles<WH2534> of wine;<WH4480> <WH3196> he stretched out<WH4900> his hand<WH3027> with<WH854> scorners.<WH3945>

For <WH3588> they have made ready<WH7126> their heart<WH3820> like an oven,<WH8574> while they lie in wait:<WH693> their baker<WH644> sleepeth<WH3463> all<WH3605> the night;<WH3915> in the morning<WH1242> it<WH1931> burneth<WH1197> as a flaming<WH3852> fire.<WH784>

They are all hot<WH2552> <WH3605> as an oven,<WH8574> and have devoured<WH398> <WH853> their judges;<WH8199> all<WH3605> their kings<WH4428> are fallen:<WH5307> there is none<WH369> among them that calleth<WH7121> unto<WH413> me.
Ephraim, <WH669> he<WH1931> hath mixed himself<WH1101> among the people;<WH5971> Ephraim<WH669> is<WH1961> a cake<WH5692> not<WH1097> turned.<WH2015>

Strangers <WH2114> have devoured<WH398> his strength,<WH3581> and he<WH1931> knoweth<WH3045> it not:<WH3808> yea,<WH1571> gray hairs<WH7872> are here and there<WH2236> upon him, yet he<WH1931> knoweth<WH3045> not.<WH3808>

And the pride<WH1347> of Israel<WH3478> testifieth<WH6030> to his face:<WH6440> and they do not<WH3808> return<WH7725> to<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> nor<WH3808> seek<WH1245> him for all<WH3605> this.<WH2063>
Ephraim <WH669> also is<WH1961> like a silly<WH6601> dove<WH3123> without<WH369> heart:<WH3820> they call<WH7121> to Egypt,<WH4714> they go<WH1980> to Assyria.<WH804>

When <WH834> they shall go,<WH1980> I will spread<WH6566> my net<WH7568> upon<WH5921> them; I will bring them down<WH3381> as the fowls<WH5775> of the heaven;<WH8064> I will chastise<WH3256> them, as their congregation<WH5712> hath heard.<WH8088>

Woe <WH188> unto them! for<WH3588> they have fled<WH5074> from<WH4480> me: destruction<WH7701> unto them! because<WH3588> they have transgressed<WH6586> against me: though I<WH595> have redeemed<WH6299> them, yet they<WH1992> have spoken<WH1696> lies<WH3577> against<WH5921> me.

And they have not<WH3808> cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> me with their heart,<WH3820> when<WH3588> they howled<WH3213> upon<WH5921> their beds:<WH4904> they assemble themselves<WH1481> for<WH5921> corn<WH1715> and wine,<WH8492> and they rebel<WH5493> against me.
Though I<WH589> have bound<WH3256> and strengthened<WH2388> their arms,<WH2220> yet do they imagine<WH2803> mischief<WH7451> against<WH413> me.

They return,<WH7725> but not<WH3808> to the most High:<WH5920> they are<WH1961> like a deceitful<WH7423> bow:<WH7198> their princes<WH8269> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> for the rage<WH4480> <WH2195> of their tongue:<WH3956> this<WH2097> shall be their derision<WH3933> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
